verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Yahweh<WH3068> in the days<WH3117> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559>

Go<WH1980> to the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites,<WH7397> and speak<WH1696> to them,<WH935> and bring them into the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> into one<WH259> of the rooms,<WH3957> and give them wine<WH3196> to drink.<WH8248>

Then I took<WH3947> Jaazaniah<WH2970> the son<WH1121> of Jeremiah,<WH3414> the son<WH1121> of Habazziniah,<WH2262> and his brothers,<WH251> and all his sons,<WH1121> and the whole house<WH1004> of the Rechabites;<WH7397>

and I brought<WH935> them into the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> into the room<WH3957> of the sons<WH1121> of Hanan<WH2605> the son<WH1121> of Igdaliah,<WH3012> the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> which was by<WH681> the room<WH3957> of the princes,<WH8269> which was above<WH4605> the room<WH3957> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the son<WH1121> of Shallum,<WH7967> the keeper<WH8104> of the threshold.<WH5592>

I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397> bowls<WH1375> full<WH4392> of wine,<WH3196> and cups;<WH3563> and I said<WH559> to them,<WH8354> Drink wine!<WH3196>

But they said,<WH559> We will drink<WH8354> no wine;<WH3196> for Jonadab<WH3122> the son<WH1121> of Rechab,<WH7394> our father,<WH1> commanded<WH6680> us,<WH559> saying, You shall drink<WH8354> no wine,<WH3196> neither you,<WH1121> nor your sons, <WH5704> forever:<WH5769>

neither shall you build<WH1129> house,<WH1004> nor sow<WH2232> seed,<WH2233> nor plant<WH5193> vineyard,<WH3754> nor have any;<WH3117> but all your days you shall dwell<WH3427> in tents;<WH168> that you may live<WH2421> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> in<WH6440> the land<WH127> in which you live.<WH1481>

We have obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab,<WH7394> our father,<WH1> in all that he commanded<WH6680> us,<WH8354> to drink no wine<WH3196> all our days,<WH3117> we,<WH802> our wives, our sons,<WH1121> or our daughters;<WH1323>
nor to build<WH1129> houses<WH1004> for us to dwell in;<WH3427> neither have we vineyard,<WH3754> nor field,<WH7704> nor seed:<WH2233>
but we have lived in<WH3427> tents,<WH168> and have obeyed,<WH8085> and done<WH6213> according to all that Jonadab<WH3122> our father<WH1> commanded us.<WH6680>

But it happened,<WH5019> when Nebuchadnezzar king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> came up<WH5927> into the land,<WH776> that we said,<WH559> Come,<WH935> and let us go<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389> for fear<WH6440> of the army<WH2428> of the Chaldeans,<WH3778> and for fear<WH6440> of the army<WH2428> of the Syrians;<WH758> so we dwell<WH3427> at Jerusalem.<WH3389>
Then came the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Go,<WH1980> and tell<WH559> the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> Will you not receive<WH3947> instruction<WH4148> to listen<WH8085> to my words?<WH1697> says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068>

The words<WH1697> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab,<WH7394> that he commanded<WH6680> his sons,<WH1121> not to drink<WH8354> wine,<WH3196> are performed;<WH6965> and to this day<WH3117> they drink<WH8354> none,<WH8085> for they obey their father<WH1>'s commandment:<WH4687> but I have spoken<WH1696> to you,<WH7925> rising up early and speaking;<WH1696> and you have not listened to me.<WH8085>

I have sent<WH7971> also to you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them,<WH559> saying, Return<WH7725> now every man<WH376> from his evil<WH7451> way,<WH1870> and amend<WH3190> your doings,<WH4611> and don't<WH3212> go after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them,<WH3427> and you shall dwell in the land<WH127> which I have given<WH5414> to you and to your fathers:<WH1> but you have not inclined<WH5186> your ear,<WH241> nor listened to me.<WH8085>

Because the sons<WH1121> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> have performed<WH6965> the commandment<WH4687> of their father<WH1> which he commanded<WH6680> them,<WH5971> but this people has not listened to me;<WH8085>

therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Behold,<WH935> I will bring on Judah<WH3063> and on all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> all the evil<WH7451> that I have pronounced<WH1696> against them;<WH1696> because I have spoken to them,<WH8085> but they have not heard; and I have called<WH7121> to them,<WH6030> but they have not answered.

Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> to the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites,<WH7397> Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Because you have obeyed<WH8085> the commandment<WH4687> of Jonadab<WH3082> your father,<WH1> and kept<WH8104> all his precepts,<WH4687> and done<WH6213> according to all that he commanded you;<WH6680>

therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Jonadab<WH3122> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> shall not want<WH3772> a man<WH376> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me forever.<WH3117>
